#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

void areA(string s1,string s2)
{
    int n1=s1.length();
        int n2=s2.length();
    if(n1!=n2)
        {
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
            return;
        }
    sort(s1.begin(),s1.end());
    sort(s2.begin(),s2.end());
    for(int i=0;i<n1;i++)
    {
        if(s1[i]!=s2[i])
           {
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
                return;
            }
    }
    cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    return;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    string s1,s2;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s1>>s2;

        areA(s1,s2);

    }
    return 0;
}
